Question: What is this issue about and what problem does it address?
There are many instances where we simply assert without providing a valid error message. This complicates debugging. We should implement proper error messages to make debugging easier.
output: Add detailed error messages for catalog assertion failures

instruction: Classify the status of this Jira issue (e.g., Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed)
input:
Title: Add detailed error messages for catalog assertion failures

Description: There are many instances where we simply assert without providing a valid error message. This complicates debugging. We should implement proper error messages to make debugging easier.
